description.raw:
Remove the custom code that mimic the X stack, in both the host and the docker container, and replace it by the [nvidia-docker software](https://github.com/NVIDIA/nvidia-docker). It brings the nice feature that we can run any version of Ubuntu on every host independently of which nvidia drivers is the host running or the Ubuntu version being tested.

Tested in a Xenial system:

   * [Xenial gazebo build](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia_test/21/)
   * [Trusty gazebo build](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia_test/1/)
